en.Each spin begins with 3 active rows and: Each spin begins with 3 active rows and for each collapse an additional row becomes active up till 6 rows.
en.A new collapse can be triggered by the f: A new collapse can be triggered by the following events:
en.Winning symbols are paid out and removed: Winning symbols are paid out and removed before triggering next collapse, which will make all symbols fall downwards leaving empty position for new symbols to drop in from above.
en.3, 4 or 5 Bonus symbols trigger the Luck: 3, 4 or 5 Bonus symbols trigger the Lucky Wagons Spins with 2, 3 or 4 rows of the reel area open initially. The feature starts with 3 spins and will reset to 3 spins every time a coin lands in the reel area. All coin values are valued as times the active bet.
en.During the feature the top row will reve: During the feature the top row will reveal enhancers for each spin - Coin values, Multipliers, Dynamite, Beer or Dwarf. An enhancer is activated when a coin lands on the reel below the enhancer.
en.The additional 7th reel may reveal Upgra: The additional 7th reel may reveal Upgrade symbols each spin. All the enhancer activating Coins landing on the Upgrade symbol row will gain the below additional effect:
en.Coin values and Multiplier will cause th: Coin values and Multiplier will cause the Coin to continue to be active for the next spin.
en.Dynamite, Beer and Dwarf features become: Dynamite, Beer and Dwarf features become persistent features, activating their effects until Lucky Wagon Spins end.
en.Below enhancers may appear on the top ro: Below enhancers may appear on the top row:
Sets the value of the coin.
en.Multiplies the value of all coins on the: Multiplies the value of all coins on the reel below the enhancer.
en.Adds the Dynamite count as times bet val: Adds the Dynamite count as times bet value to the triggering coin. It then throws as many Dynamites as its count on reel positions.
en.If it lands on Dirt: will remove Dirt sy: If it lands on Dirt: will remove Dirt symbol.
en.If it lands on Coin: will double its Coi: If it lands on Coin: will double its Coin value.
en.If it lands on Chest: will activate the: If it lands on Chest: will activate the Chest.
en.Reactivates 0-5 old Coins which makes th: Reactivates 0-5 old Coins which makes them trigger their respective enhancers for the next spin.
en.Collects all values in the reel area at: Collects all values in the reel area at the triggering coin position.
en.During the feature the bottom row Collec: During the feature the bottom row Collect Chest can be activated by Dynamites. When a Collect Chest is activated it will collect the values in the reel area for the corresponding column above for every spin.
en.An xBomb Wild symbol substitutes for any: An xBomb Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol except Bonus symbols.
en.An exploding xBomb Wild removes adjacent: An exploding xBomb Wild removes adjacent symbols except Bonus symbols and will increase the win multiplier by its value for the next collapse.
en.All xBomb Wild will explode before the n: All xBomb Wild will explode before the next collapse except when Wild Mining feature is triggered.
en.Wild Mining will be triggered in main ga: Wild Mining will be triggered in main game when 3, 4, 5 or 6 of the same kind of symbols align horizontally or vertically and there is no winning combination.
en.The triggering symbols will be removed c: The triggering symbols will be removed creating Wild symbols in the middle positions of the alignment:
en.All other positions above the bar will e: All other positions above the bar will explode if not a Bonus or Wild symbol and trigger a new collapse.
en.Awards Lucky Wagon Spins with 5 Bonus sy: Awards Lucky Wagon Spins with 5 Bonus symbols and a guaranteed persistent Dwarf at a cost of 3600 times the base bet.
en.Dirt symbols in main game may contain a: Dirt symbols in main game may contain a Wild, xSplit or Bonus symbols.
en.Feature symbols buried in dirt are inact: Feature symbols buried in dirt are inactive until the dirt block they are contained in is removed or hit by an xSplit feature.
en.An xSplit symbol splits symbols on its r: An xSplit symbol splits symbols on its row, doubling those symbols. Symbols spliting into 8 or more will be shown with a multiplier instead.
en.Bonus symbols and xSplit symbols cannot: Bonus symbols and xSplit symbols cannot be split.
en.Once all xSplit symbols have activated,: Once all xSplit symbols have activated, they all turn into one of the regular symbols.
en.Dirt blocks affected by a split feature: Dirt blocks affected by a split feature are removed if there is a collapse.
en.At the cost of 2.5 times the base bet, a: At the cost of 2.5 times the base bet, at least 1 Bonus symbol is guaranteed on the last inactive row for each spin.
en.Additionally, all dirt positions are rem: Additionally, all dirt positions are removed from the main game, making the burried features land without the dirt and trigger immediately when they are in the active reels.
en.Winning 65 000 times the base bet will c: Winning 65 000 times the base bet will clean the mine out and the game round will be over.
en.No dirt and 4 times more likely to trigg: No dirt and 4 times more likely to trigger Lucky Wagon Spins.
en.The theoretical return to the player for: The theoretical return to the player for 3 BONUS feature buy is -3%.
The theoretical return to the player for 4 BONUS feature buy is -4%.
The theoretical return to the player for 5 BONUS feature buy is -5%.
The theoretical return to the player for Lucky Draw feature buy is -6%.
The theoretical return to the player for xBet is -2%.
The theoretical return to the player for 5 BONUS - Guaranteed Dwarf feature buy is -6%.
en.Fire In The Hole 2 is a video slot with: Fire In The Hole 2 is a video slot with following feature(s):
en.A 6-reel, up to 6-row video slot with 12: A 6-reel, up to 6-row video slot with 12 symbols.
From 64 ways up to 46656 win ways.
en.Lucky Wagon Spins will end if the reel a: Lucky Wagon Spins will end if the reel area is full and there are no active features for remaining spins.
en.A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol: A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol except Bonus.
